Name: Bentley
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry, spiced wine impregnated with apple - pretty damn good.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Bentley contains 145 calories
